solution_line_template: First find the number of crabs Max can get by dividing the number of coconuts by the exchange rate with crabs: {total_coconuts} coconuts / {coconuts_per_crab} coconuts/crab = <<{total_coconuts}/{coconuts_per_crab}={total_crabs}>>{total_crabs} crabs
Then divide the number of crabs by the exchange rate with goats: {total_crabs} crabs / {crabs_per_goat} crabs/goat = <<{total_crabs}/{crabs_per_goat}={total_goats}>>{total_goats} goats
